lexUnit.name: fall.v
lexUnit.definition: COD: move from a higher to a lower level, typically rapidly and without control

sentence.text: An enormous bomb fell on a place nearby called Spurgeon 's Tabernacle , so close that it blew in all the windows and knocked the marquee for six .
Always sleep by the guns , he said , and never let the men dig bolt holes , lest they become too attached to them when the bombs begin to fall .
Another bomb fell in front of the bus garage at South Croydon on 10 May 1941 .
A dummy bomb fell from a Royal Air Force plane , slightly injuring one man at a peace demonstration on a practice range at Nordhorn , Lower Saxony .
Bombs falling on cities , houses crumbling like sandcastles .
What if his bombs had fallen on a hospital ?
AN RAF dummy bomb fell into a crowd of German pacifists demonstrating in a military exercise area yesterday , slightly injuring a woman .
The rain was still falling in sheets .
Today rain falling over Denmark , West Germany , Sweden and the East Midlands of the UK is often pH 4 or less : over 40 times the natural acidity .
Great drops of rain started to fall .
There was no roof and the rain that had fallen in the night left dark stripes where it trickled down the greasy surface of the cows ' rumps .
In one storm , 46 inches of rain fell in 24 hours .
The wind had died down completely , leaving a grey , cold day with a steady rain falling out of a sky as blank as a white eye .
As if in support of this statement , rain began to fall heavily .
A few heavy spots of rain were falling on the pavements like coins .
The snow was falling more lightly , thank God , which increased his range of vision .
The weather was still bitterly cold and snow fell on 28 December .

Soot-contaminated snow falling in mountainous regions may have darkened snowfields causing the spring snowmelt to be earlier and quicker than usual , leading to river flooding and ecologically damaging acidic meltwater pulses .
` Randolph , has some snow fallen on your nose ? "
At one point the mistress of disguise demonstrated to her co-accused how the ginger wig she had been wearing when they were stopped by police , fell off as she adjusted her hat .
His bag was ripped , and tins fell out .
` Actually , " she added swiftly , ` I got very drunk that night , fell in your fountain , and Luke gallantly fished me out .
` Should be ten but the eldest got drunk and fell in the river ! "
While leaving it to cool , I reached over for the map ; the mug was caught by my sleeve , fell forward with a gurgle , and emptied .
Wood 's attempt to clear a back pass fell at the feet of Norris , who sidefooted into the net .
And when Summerchild fell from the back of the Admiralty , I am beginning to think , the prospects of Tite and his department must have fallen with him .
He reeled backwards , one smashed incisor falling from his bleeding , pulped gums .
A tear fell from the corner of Jinkwa 's eye .
Anne Haine was n't expected to survive after she fell from her horse 18 months ago , but she 's proved the doctors wrong , fighting her way back into the saddle .
The women cut their own slices smaller than the men 's , as they were accustomed to do , though Rosalba picked at the crumbs fallen from the baking pan .
` If they fall into the sea we 'll know it does n't work and we wo n't go . "
The guard rail twisted beneath her hands , and they fell backwards into empty space .
It is therefore advisable to place water lilies away from your fountain and water fall , to minimise the amount of water falling on the leaves .
A couple of sheets of corrugated iron broke loose and fell on Mr pugh 's head .
Eventually Maidstone tried to scramble over the bar but he slipped and fell heavily onto the floor .
Police say the baby may have fallen head-first onto a tiled floor .
Asik reached to hide his face and fell onto the ground .
He says she fell onto a concrete road .
The beetle 's antenna also helps it to locate prey by sensing the tell-tale vibrations of any small insect which falls onto the surface .
The dressing gown fell to the carpet .
Gabriel took his hands off the hilt of the sword , expecting it to fall with a clatter .
Anything or anyone who falls through the event horizon will soon reach the region of infinite density and the end of time .
There was the sound of an explosion with rocks and earth falling from behind them .
The flare fell away , drifting behind the funnel .
He apparently tripped over his cat and fell downstairs and will be out for six weeks .
The laundered clothes had fallen every which way and my cases were in a jumbled heap in the back , but we did n't stop .
The boy fell thirty feet from a ski lift in a Californian resort .
